ctx: intros f g x Hf Hg.
exceptions.exn: The LHS of Derive_plus (Derive (fun x : R => _ x + _ x) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

ctx: intros f g x Hf Hg.
exceptions.exn: The LHS of Derive_opp (Derive (fun x : R => - _ x) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros f g x Hf Hg. unfold Derive. rewrite Derive_plus. rewrite Derive_opp.
